00193     def CreateColorBitmap(self, c):
00194         image = wx.EmptyImage(25, 14)
00195         
00196         for x in xrange(25):
00197             for y in xrange(14):
00198                 pixcol = c
00199                 if x == 0 or x == 24 or y == 0 or y == 13:
00200                     pixcol = wx.BLACK
00201                     
00202                 image.SetRGB(x, y, pixcol.Red(), pixcol.Green(), pixcol.Blue())
00203             
00204         return image.ConvertToBitmap()
00205

00207     def UpdateColors(self):
00208     
00209         bk = self._frame_frame.GetDockArt().GetColour(wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_BACKGROUND_COLOUR)
00210         self._background_color_background_color.SetBitmapLabel(self.CreateColorBitmapCreateColorBitmap(bk))
00211         
00212         cap = self._frame_frame.GetDockArt().GetColour(wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_INACTIVE_CAPTION_COLOUR)

00240     def OnPaneBorderSize(self, event):
00241     
00242         self._frame_frame.GetDockArt().SetMetric(wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_PANE_BORDER_SIZE,
00243                                            event.GetInt())
00244         self._frame_frame.DoUpdate()

00261     def OnSetColor(self, event):
00262     
00263         dlg = wx.ColourDialog(self._frame_frame)
00264         
00265         dlg.SetTitle("Color Picker")
00266         
00267         if dlg.ShowModal() != wx.ID_OK:
00268             return
00269         
00270         var = 0
00271         if event.GetId() == ID_BackgroundColor:
00272             var = wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_BACKGROUND_COLOUR
00273         elif event.GetId() == ID_SashColor:
00274             var = wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_SASH_COLOUR
00275         elif event.GetId() == ID_InactiveCaptionColor:
00276             var = wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_INACTIVE_CAPTION_COLOUR
00277         elif event.GetId() == ID_InactiveCaptionGradientColor:
00278             var = wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_INACTIVE_CAPTION_GRADIENT_COLOUR
00279         elif event.GetId() == ID_InactiveCaptionTextColor:
00280             var = wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_INACTIVE_CAPTION_TEXT_COLOUR
00281         elif event.GetId() == ID_ActiveCaptionColor:
00282             var = wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_ACTIVE_CAPTION_COLOUR
00283         elif event.GetId() == ID_ActiveCaptionGradientColor:
00284             var = wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_ACTIVE_CAPTION_GRADIENT_COLOUR
00285         elif event.GetId() == ID_ActiveCaptionTextColor:
00286             var = wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_ACTIVE_CAPTION_TEXT_COLOUR
00287         elif event.GetId() == ID_BorderColor:
00288             var = wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_BORDER_COLOUR
00289         elif event.GetId() == ID_GripperColor:
00290             var = wx.aui.AUI_DOCKART_GRIPPER_COLOUR
00291         else:
00292             return        
00293         
00294         self._frame_frame.GetDockArt().SetColor(var, dlg.GetColourData().GetColour())
00295         self._frame_frame.DoUpdate()
00296         self.UpdateColorsUpdateColors()
